name: bookrestaurant
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool camrest676.
Tool description: CamRest service por restaurant reservation
API description: Books a restaurant based on the provided criteria using the RapidAPI CamRest API.

pricerange.description: The desired price range for the restaurant.

area.description: The area in which to search for the restaurant.

food.description: The type of food preferred, default is 'spanish'.

restaurantname.description: The name of the restaurant, default is 'McDonalds'.
